Name: RUNES Magica
About the game: RUNES Magica is 2D rogue-like magic action game. Game feature ■ Rune system : You can create a new rune by combining and strengthening the rune. ■ Magic : Use your own rune as the form of magic you want. ■ Randomly generated map. ■ Various magic and artifacts Story The magicians of the Niaten Kingdom are falsely accused and chased by the Knights. Lunia, a girl wizard who lived in hiding with her father, loses her father to the Knights and leaves for revenge. Knights The Knights will annihilate all wizards by order of the Knights King. Defeat the chasing Knights and fulfill your revenge. Bounty Hunters The bounty hunters attack Lunia for bounty, honor, and their own reasons. Eliminate all enemies in Lunia's way.
Meta Title: RUNES Magica: May 2, 2022, BONE MADE and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on RUNES Magica? Check out the release date (May 2, 2022), developer insights from BONE MADE, and a complete game summary.
